sentences.en: And it is further proved that the technique is effective and practical by means of the examples of the extraction of periodic and aperiodic signals.
sentences.cn: 运用周期和非周期弱信号的检测实例，进一步证明了该方法的有效性和实用性。

sentences.en: Events that are aperiodic and represent an occurence.
sentences.cn: 不定期的并表示出现一次的事件.

sentences.en: In the tectonic plate aspect, performance and so on aperiodic stock like highway are prominent.
sentences.cn: 在板块方面, 非周期性的个股如高速公路等表现突出.
惯性环节 ( 非周期环节 )

sentences.en: Most of the sequences are aperiodic with recurrence intervals varying from a few minutes to hundreds of days.
sentences.cn: 大部分相似地震的活动表现为非周期性，重复间隔从数分钟到数百天不等。

sentences.en: Such aperiodic motions are not quantized.
sentences.cn: 这种非周期性的运动不是量子化的.

sentences.en: The aperiodic cross - correlation function between groups has either uniform IFW or perfect complement.
sentences.cn: 码组间的非周期互相关函数具有均匀分布的IFW,或者完美理想互补的特点.

sentences.en: The physical mechanism of signal processing based on the aperiodic stochastic resonance(ASR) system is analyzed, and a statistical approach for recovering the binary signal is proposed.
sentences.cn: 分析了利用非周期随机共振进行基带信号检测的物理机制，提出了一种基于统计的信号恢复新方法。

sentences.en: This paper proposes a new aperiodic correlation signal, which is complementary binary array pairs ( CBAP ).
sentences.cn: 提出了一种新的非循环相关信号, 即互补二进阵列偶.

words.tran_cn: 不定期的；[数]非周期性的

trans.tran_cn: 非周期性的，不定期的，<物>非周期的，（振动等）非周期的
trans.tran_en: not periodic; not occurring at regular intervals
